news_header: Chinese helicopter flies close to Philippine aircraft; protest expected.
news_original_title: Chinese navy helicopter flies 'dangerously' close to Philippine plane
news_text: A Chinese navy helicopter flew dangerously close to a Philippine aircraft in a disputed area of the South China Sea, prompting the Philippine government to file a formal protest. The incident occurred near Scarborough Shoal, which has been contested since 2012. Meanwhile, the Kumbh Mela in India faces tragedy with fears of casualties, and political unrest continues in South Korea with impeachment proceedings.
